article.title: Capitol I.T. Solutions to Support Medical Research and Technical Programs
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Capitol I.T. Solutions Incorporated, Germantown, Maryland, was awarded about $14 million for the non-personnel services to support the research and technical programs at Fort Detrick, Maryland. The U.S. Army Medical Research Acquisition Activity, Fort Detrick, is the contracting activity.
